entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:03PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Colville River This Week... Runoff from heavy rainfall over the upper Colville River Basin will be moving downriver this week. Between 1.00 to 1.75 inches of rain fell between Sunday morning to Monday morning in the foothills of the Brooks Range. Water levels will rise significantly and may approach bankfull in some low lying areas.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Northwestern Brooks Range
